briefdescription.para: Set uart baudrate.

listitem.para: Param usage : uart baudrate, must above zero. Here is a list of possible baudrates

briefdescription.para: Get current device status.

listitem.para: Param usage : store result of current status

briefdescription.para: Enable uart device.

listitem.para: Param usage : param is not required

briefdescription.para: Disable uart device, when device is disabled, only UART_CMD_ENA_DEV, UART_CMD_DIS_DEV and UART_CMD_GET_STATUS commands can be executed, other commands will return E_SYS.

listitem.para: Param usage : param is not required

briefdescription.para: Flush uart device output.

listitem.para: Param usage : param is not required

briefdescription.para: Get how many bytes space in uart are available to transmit, this can be used in interrupt callback functions, cooperate with uart_write API to realize non-blocked write.

listitem.para: Param usage : store the write available bytes, > 0 for available bytes, 0 for not available

briefdescription.para: Get how many bytes in uart are available to receive, this can be used in interrupt callback functions, cooperate with uart_read API to realize non-blocked read.

listitem.para: Param usage : store the read available bytes, > 0 for available bytes, 0 for not available

briefdescription.para: Cause a break condition to be transmitted to the receiving device.

listitem.para: Param usage : param is not required

briefdescription.para: Clear break condition and return to normal.

listitem.para: Param usage : param is not required

briefdescription.para: Change uart D/P/S(Data/Parity/Stop) format.

listitem.para: Param usage : uart dps format including databits, parity and stopbits

briefdescription.para: Set uart device hardware flow control.

listitem.para: Param usage : uart dps format including databits, parity and stopbits

briefdescription.para: Set uart transmit success callback function when all required bytes are transmitted for interrupt method.

listitem.para: Param usage : transmit success callback function for uart

briefdescription.para: Set uart receive success callback function when all required bytes are received for interrupt method.

listitem.para: Param usage : receive success callback function for uart

briefdescription.para: Set uart transfer error callback function when something error happened for interrupt method.

listitem.para: Param usage : transfer error callback function for uart

briefdescription.para: Set transmit buffer via interrupt, and it will set tx_buf.

listitem.para: Param usage : buffer structure pointer, if param is NULL, then it will set tx_buf to NULL

briefdescription.para: Set receive buffer via interrupt, and it will set rx_buf.

listitem.para: Param usage : buffer structure pointer, if param is NULL, then it will set rx_buf to NULL

briefdescription.para: Enable or disable transmit interrupt.

listitem.para: Param usage : enable(none-zero) or disable(zero) flag

briefdescription.para: Enable or disable receive interrupt.

listitem.para: Param usage : enable(none-zero) or disable(zero) flag

briefdescription.para: Abort current interrupt transmit operation if tx interrupt enabled, it will disable transmit interrupt, and set DEV_IN_TX_ABRT in status variable, and call the transmit callback function, when tx callback is finished, it will clear DEV_IN_TX_ABRT and return.

Abort current interrupt receive operation if rx interrupt enabled, it will disable receive interrupt, and set DEV_IN_TX_ABRT in status variable, and call the receive callback function, when rx callback is finished, it will clear DEV_IN_TX_ABRT and return.
Set extra information pointer of uart info.
Get extra information pointer of uart info.
UART Device Parity Types Enum.
UART Device Stop Bits Enum.
UART Device Hardware Flow Control Types Enum.
UART DPS Format: databits/parity/stopbits.
UART information struct definition.

detaileddescription.para: informations about uart open count, working status, baudrate, uart registers and ctrl structure, uart dps format

briefdescription.para: UART device interface definition.

detaileddescription.para:
Define uart device interface, like uart information structure, provide functions to open/close/control uart, send/receive data by uart
All this details are implemented by user in user porting code

briefdescription.para: Default UART DPS format.
Default hardware flow control method.
get an uart device by uart device id.

detaileddescription.para:
For how to use uart device hal refer to Functions in uart device structure
uart_id
id of uart, defined by user
!NULL
pointer to an uart device structure
NULL
failed to find the uart device by uart_id
need to implemented by user in user code get an uart device by uart device id.

briefdescription.para: uart device hardware layer definitions

detaileddescription.para: Provide common definitions for uart device, then software developer can develop uart driver following this definitions, and the applications can directly call this definition to realize functions
